lines: 1. Ko rirandi rikobugigw' as'omoerio,Natorore omobas' obarire;N' abatorigwe korw'ensebaumeran'aria ng'umbu,Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.
Gakorangeri' amarieta,Gakorangeri' amarieta,Gakorangeri' amarieta,Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.
2. Rituk'erio n'omogok'abachenu bakoboka,Nabakwete kare nababoke pi;Abachore nabagendena Nyasae igoro,Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.
3. Natokore emeremoya Nyasae eere,Tokwan'obwachaniobo bw'ogokumia;Eri' emerem'ekoeranatogende Igoro,Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.
